instruction: Please implement a hotel booking mini-program for booking hotel rooms. The mini-program should have functionalities for booking rooms, synchronizing check-in information, and viewing check-in records. Users should be able to browse hotel rooms, select room types and check-in dates, book rooms, and synchronize check-in information. The mini-program should also be able to update check-in information in real-time, allowing users to easily view their check-in records. Set the background color to light sea green and the component color to dark slate gray.

Please implement a website to resolve Gmail spam issues. The website should have functionalities for reporting spam, marking non-spam emails, and managing blacklists. Users should be able to log in, report received spam emails, mark misjudged emails as non-spam, and manage their own blacklists. Apply theme using daisy white as background and khaki for elements.

Please implement a live streaming website for audio and video live streaming. The website should have functionalities for multi-person live streaming and live PK. Users should be able to log in, browse different types of live streams, join live rooms, send danmu and gifts, and interact with the anchor. The website should also have live room management functions, where anchors can manage their own live rooms, set live themes, tags, and covers. Assign light goldenrod yellow to body backgrounds and olive drab to main components.

Please fix a web application with 3D functionality and resolve interface issues. The application should have normal interactive functions, including mouse and keyboard event responses, 3D model loading and rendering, and animation playback. Users should be able to browse and operate the application normally, with no error or warning prompts. The application should support multiple browsers and devices, including desktop and mobile devices. Use light coral as the default background and brown for component styling.

Please implement a database operation website for performing database operations such as adding, deleting, modifying, and querying. The website should have functionalities for connecting to a database, executing SQL statements, viewing table structures, adding, deleting, and modifying data records. Users should be able to log in, select a database type, input connection information, execute SQL statements, view query results, and perform add, delete, and modify operations on data records. Apply smoke to the canvas background and midnight blue to all visible components.

Please implement a green plant mini-program for sharing and purchasing green plant-related products. The mini-program should have community features such as topic discussions, experience sharing, cultivation recommendations, and cultivation plans. At the same time, it should include an online mall where users can browse and purchase green plant-related products and support online payment functions. Users should be able to register and log in to the mini-program, manage personal information, and view order records. Assign alice blue to the background and cornflower blue to the UI elements.

Please design a website for personal trainers that includes features such as booking systems, testimonials, class schedules, contact forms, and lead forums. Users should be able to browse the website, view the trainer's information, book classes, submit testimonials, and contact the trainer through the contact form. The website should have a clear navigation menu, including items such as home, about the trainer, classes, testimonials, and contact. Choose powder blue for global background and medium blue for all components.

Please implement a digital platform website for displaying and managing digital content. The website should have functionalities for user registration, login, browsing digital content, searching, and managing personal information. Users should be able to register an account, log in to the website, browse and search digital content, and manage their personal information and account settings. Style all pages with a light salmon background and coral components.

Please develop a simple demo website for an AI-driven travel platform, including basic AI features and a simple web interface. Users should be able to browse travel destinations, view recommended itineraries, and get real-time information. The website should have a user-friendly interface and be able to quickly demonstrate AI-driven travel recommendations. Apply platinum for the layout background and midnight blue for interactive elements.

Please implement a translatable job board website for the renewable energy sector, supporting multiple languages and keyword search. The website should have the following functions: job search, filtering, employer account management, job posting management, GDPR compliance, and paid job posting. Users can register and log in to the website, browse and search for jobs, apply for jobs, and view application status. Employers can register and log in to the website, post jobs, manage jobs, and view job views and application quantity. Use alabaster as the screen background and dark cyan for component highlights.

Please implement an artificial intelligence-based travel application that provides personalized travel recommendations. The application should have navigation features, allowing users to browse different destinations, activities, and services. Users should be able to input their personal preferences and interests, and the application will provide personalized recommendations based on this information. The application should also include user account management, search functionality, and trip planning tools. Set all pages to have a linen background and saddle brown components.

Please implement a mini-program for tourism booking and merchandise purchase. The mini-program should have functionalities for managing tourist attractions, making reservations, and purchasing merchandise. Users should be able to browse attraction information, make reservations, purchase related products, and view order information. The mini-program should also have user login and registration functions, allowing users to view their order history and personal information. Apply floral white as the background; style all components with dark red.

Please implement a website homepage that includes multiple sections, such as a navigation menu, carousel, product showcase, and news updates. Users should be able to browse the website homepage, view the content of different sections, and click on the navigation menu to jump to the corresponding pages. The website homepage should have a responsive design that adapts to different devices and screen sizes. Assign spring green to body backgrounds and lime green to main components.

Please implement a 3D business card website for creating and managing electronic business cards. The website should have functionalities for creating and editing business cards, adding text introductions, image descriptions, promotional videos, quick navigation, and company VR. Users should be able to collect and annotate business cards and customize business card templates. The website should also have business card management functionality, allowing users to view and edit their own business cards. Style all pages with a lemon chiffon background and olive components.

Please implement an Oracle database management website for browsing and editing databases. The website should have functionalities for browsing, editing, inserting, and deleting data, as well as executing SQL statements. Users should be able to log in, browse database table structures, edit data, insert new data, delete data, and execute arbitrary SQL statements. Set the background to turquoise, and apply cadet blue to components.

Please implement a website that automates the processing of incoming emails by analyzing and responding to them. The website should have the functionality to analyze the content and keywords of incoming emails and automatically generate predefined responses or follow-up questions based on the analysis. Users can send inquiries via email, and the system will automatically determine the type of inquiry and send a corresponding response or question. If more information is needed, the system will generate follow-up questions until a response is received from the sender, at which point it will be internally processed. Use a smoke background and apply midnight blue to the UI components.

Please implement a simple search website for searching information and changing wallpapers. The website should have a search function, allowing users to input content in the search box and press enter to jump to the specific search information page. The website should also have a wallpaper-changing function, allowing users to right-click to change the random background image. The website should display a timer and random quotes. Assign mint cream to the background and dark green to the UI elements.

Please implement a website for IoT data collection and visualization to display and analyze collected data. The website should have functionalities for data collection, data visualization, data download, user authentication, and device parameter configuration. Users should be able to log in, browse and analyze collected data, download data tables, and configure device parameters. Style the layout with honeydew in the background and forest green for the interface.

Please implement a smart production system to manage the entire factory production process. The system should have functionalities for order management, production planning, procurement planning, demand planning, work order management, reporting, inspection, warehousing, and sales management. Users should be able to log in, create and manage orders, generate production plans, procurement plans, and demand plans, create and manage work orders, perform reporting, inspection, and warehousing, and manage the sales process. Configure your theme with eggshell as background and dark slate gray as component color.

Please implement a community app for young people with hair loss issues, providing a platform for discussing hair loss, hair transplantation, and hair care. The app should have functionalities for registration, login, posting, commenting, and searching. Users should be able to register and log in, browse and post articles, comment on others' posts, and search for related topics. The app should also have a personal center where users can view their own posts, comments, and collections. Define the background as magenta and components as dark violet.

Please implement a website with map functionality that allows users to view maps, search for locations, and get navigation directions. The website should have functionalities such as map zooming, dragging, and marking locations. Users should be able to input keywords to search for specific locations and get relevant information. Declare light pink as the global background color and hotpink for all UI pieces.

Please implement a modern TV UI for a motel that supports various content categories, including live TV channels, streaming apps, local information, and built-in casting. The interface should use a tabbed layout and be navigable using a remote control. The interface should be empty of content, allowing users to input their own content. Configure all backgrounds with champagne and all components with firebrick.

Please implement a Groovy development website that integrates the Google Guice framework. The website should have functionalities for code editing, dependency injection, and module management. Users should be able to log in, create and edit Groovy projects, use the Google Guice framework for dependency injection, and manage project modules. Use peach for the background and orangered for components.

Please implement a platform for errand running services that matches demand with service providers. The platform should have functionalities for user management, order posting, order management, recharge management, point management, coupons, news management, and withdrawal management. Users should be able to register and log in to the platform, post errand demands or provide errand services, manage their orders and account information, and perform recharge, withdrawal, and point redemption operations. Design the site using light goldenrod yellow as the background and olive drab for content blocks.

Please implement a WordPress website based on Bootstrap, with a responsive design and customizable layout. Users should be able to browse the website, read articles, view images and videos, and interact with the author through the comment feature. The website should have a clear navigation menu, including home, about, contact, and other functions. Users should be able to quickly find the content they need through the search function. Choose gold for global background and dark goldenrod for all components.

Please implement a financial information display WeChat mini-program to showcase financial knowledge and information. The mini-program should have features such as a homepage, news, and poster generation. Users should be able to browse the homepage, view financial news, generate posters, and refresh content in real-time. The mini-program should be able to maintain the user's online status and provide seamless refresh functionality. Users should be able to view financial knowledge and information through the mini-program and share posters on social media. Use buttermilk for container backgrounds and peru for component visuals.

Please implement a social media summarization web application to summarize trending content from Twitter, LinkedIn, and Reddit. The application should have the functionality to fetch, process, and summarize content from these platforms, and use the LDA model to generate accurate and concise summaries. Users should be able to browse and view these summaries, and the application should provide a list view to effectively display these summaries. Assign moccasin as the background color and apply sandy brown to all elements.

Please implement an AI navigation website to help users find suitable AI tools. The website should have functionalities for searching, categorizing, and recommending AI tools. Users should be able to input keywords to search for related AI tools, browse different categories of AI tools, view recommended AI tools, and be able to rate and comment on tools. Assign melon to body backgrounds and tomato to main components.

Please implement a blog filter page to filter and display blog posts. The page should have the functionality to filter articles by category, tags, date, and other conditions. Users should be able to select different filter conditions, view the corresponding article list, and click on the article title to view the article details. Assign melon as the background color and apply tomato to all elements.

Please implement a customer questionnaire and ID verification store application. The application should have a customer questionnaire function, which determines whether ID verification is required based on the customer's responses. If ID verification is required, the customer must upload images of their ID. The application should also have an admin dashboard where administrators can create and manage questionnaires, set rules, track and manage customer ID verification statuses. Customers can view their own verification status and proceed directly to checkout after verification is approved. Apply wheat for layout; use chocolate for buttons and cards.

Please implement a photo album management website for managing and sharing photos. The website should have functionalities for uploading photos, creating albums, managing albums, and sharing photos. Users should be able to log in, upload their own photos, create and manage albums, share photos with other users, and browse and comment on other users' photos. Select champagne for layout background and burnt sienna for component details.

Please implement a WordPress plugin that creates SEO-optimized articles. The plugin should be able to use free APIs to generate high-quality articles and support multiple languages. The plugin should be able to generate optimized article titles, descriptions, and keywords based on user input. Users should be able to customize the length, style, and tone of the articles. The plugin should also be able to analyze the user's website and provide optimization suggestions. Configure all backgrounds with powder blue and all components with medium blue.

Please implement a public information QR code system to provide the public with coastal strategy updates. The system should have the functionality to redirect to a chatbot after scanning the QR code, and the chatbot should provide updates on coastal strategies, shoreline plans, and public sessions. Users should be able to obtain the latest information about coastal areas through the chatbot and understand ongoing work and strategies. The system should also have a user feedback function, allowing users to submit suggestions and opinions. Use pale turquoise as the screen background and medium turquoise for component highlights.

Please develop a single-player game application with multiple game modes, level selection, and score tracking features. Users should be able to choose different game modes, browse through levels, select levels to play, and track their scores. The game should have clear operation guidelines and a user-friendly interface. Declare antique white as the global background color and sienna for all UI pieces.

Please implement a lightweight business middle platform to solve the expansion problem of complex business scenarios. The platform should have functions such as business asset sedimentation, inheritance, and expansion of complex business scenarios. Users should be able to log in to the platform, manage business assets, expand business scenarios, and configure the core elements of the middle platform. The platform should support multiple business scenarios, including but not limited to order management, customer management, and product management. Apply powder blue for layout; use royal blue for buttons and cards.

Please implement a warehouse management system to track the storage and movement of materials within a warehouse. The system should have functionalities for inventory management, including receiving, storing, and shipping of materials. Users should be able to log in, browse, and manage the materials within the warehouse, including receiving, shipping, inventory management, and querying historical material information. The system should also be able to record and track material history, provide settlement and shipping functionality, and support detailed material tracking. Use dust white for the background and forest green for components.

Please implement a website based on ReactJs and Mongo and deploy it to Cpanel. The website should have functionalities such as user interface, data storage and retrieval. Users should be able to browse the website, view data, and interact with it. The website should be able to handle user input, update data, and display results in real-time. The website should also have error handling and debugging capabilities to ensure its stability and security. Configure your theme with light beige as background and sienna as component color.

Please implement a Plane War mini-program with 3D game functionality. Users should be able to log in to the mini-program, start the game, control the plane to fight, score, and view rankings. The mini-program should have functions such as starting, pausing, and ending the game. Users should be able to choose different planes and levels and view game help and instructions. Set smoke as the body background and use midnight blue for the UI.

Please implement a network TV tuner website for browsing and playing TV programs. The website should have functionalities for browsing TV programs, playing TV programs, and collecting TV programs. Users should be able to log in, browse the list of TV programs, select the TV program to play, collect favorite TV programs, and view play history. Implement styling with powder blue for the background and medium blue for components.

Please implement a mobile API and web dashboard for displaying and managing data. Users should be able to retrieve data through the mobile API interface and view and analyze data on the web dashboard. The web dashboard should have functionalities such as data visualization, report generation, and user management. Implement violet for the page background and indigo for the elements.

Please implement a review page for an anime fan community website. The page should have functionalities for displaying anime information, user reviews, and ratings. Users should be able to browse detailed anime information, view other users' reviews, post their own reviews, and rate the anime. The page should also include features such as related anime recommendations, review sorting, and filtering. Set lavender blush as the body background and use pale violet red for the UI.

Please implement a Doodle Jump-style game for the web, with features such as level-up modes, bonus rounds, and point scoring systems. The game should have a user-friendly interface and visual effects, with great sound effects. Users should be able to control the character to jump and avoid obstacles, earning points and rewards. The game should have multiple levels, each with different challenges and difficulties. Users should be able to view their scores and rankings, and compare with other players. Color the background using magenta and set component styles to dark violet.

Please implement an RSS collection and caching website for collecting and caching subscription information. The website should have functionalities for collecting subscription information, caching subscription information, searching queries, and category management. Users should be able to add subscription sources, cache subscription information, and use search queries and category management to find and manage subscription information. Use gainsboro for the outer layout and dark slate blue for UI blocks.

Please implement a macroeconomic database and analysis dashboard website that provides macroeconomic data and analysis. The website should have functionalities for data querying, data visualization, and automatic interpretation. Users should be able to log in, query macroeconomic data, view visualized charts, obtain automatically interpreted analysis results, and make predictions. Use champagne as the screen background and burnt sienna for component highlights.

Please implement a machine learning website to display and apply machine learning algorithms. The website should have functionalities for data preprocessing, feature extraction, model training, and prediction. Users should be able to upload data, select algorithms, train models, and use models for prediction. The website should also have cross-validation and model evaluation functionalities. Color the background using sky blue and set component styles to steel blue.

Please implement a comprehensive research service public account to monitor work status and handle work business at any time. The public account should have functionalities for viewing work status, handling work business, and submitting reports. Users should be able to view work progress in real-time, handle related business, and submit reports through the public account. The public account should also have personalized settings and notification functions, allowing users to customize the interface and receive important notifications. Set the background to salmon, and apply crimson to components.

Please implement a home committee circle sharing mini-program for communication and sharing between parents and teachers. Users can create schools and home committees, apply to join them, and post various types of posts. Posts can be set to be visible only to the class or to all users, and can also be assigned to a specific topic. Posts within the class need to be reviewed by administrators before being published to the school. Administrators are divided into school administrators and class administrators, with different permissions, including posting announcements, pinning posts, and approving class membership applications. Set page background to faint gray; color all components with slate gray.

Please implement a quality inspection website for geographic information databases to detect and analyze the quality of geographic information data. The website should have functionalities for data upload, error detection, missing data identification, inconsistency analysis, and repair suggestions. Users should be able to upload geographic information data, and the website should automatically detect errors, missing data, and inconsistencies, and provide repair suggestions. Users should be able to view inspection reports, track changes in data quality, and download repaired data. Use frost white for the background and charcoal for components.

Please implement a PHP web application based on nanomsg to provide real-time messaging functionality. Users should be able to send and receive messages through the web interface, and the application should have functionalities for publishing, subscribing, receiving, and processing messages. Users should be able to create and manage their own message channels and choose to receive or ignore messages from other users. Implement styling with dust white for the background and forest green for components.

Please implement a QR code website for generating and managing QR codes. The website should have functionalities for generating QR codes, customizing QR codes, and managing QR code history. Users should be able to log in, input content to generate QR codes, customize the color, size, and style of the QR codes, manage the history of generated QR codes, and download or share the QR codes. Initialize the background color with light sea green and component color with medium sea green.

Please implement a mobile photo album system for managing and categorizing photos. The system should have image classification and face recognition functions, which can automatically categorize photos into different categories such as people, landscapes, animals, etc., and can identify people in photos, grouping the same person's photos into the same album. Users can browse and manage their own photos, easily finding the photos they are interested in. Use a thistle background and apply medium purple to the UI components.

Please implement a web application that generates QR codes from CSV files. Users should be able to upload CSV files, and the application should generate corresponding QR code images. After scanning the QR code, it should display the text information contained in the QR code. The application should also allow users to manually upload Excel workbooks and extract necessary details from the CSV file for printing. Apply plum to the canvas background and dark magenta to all visible components.

Please implement a news aggregation website that collects and displays RSS and Atom Feeds. The website should have functionalities such as automatic feed discovery and RSS output. Users should be able to add, remove, and manage RSS and Atom Feed sources, view aggregated news content, and share it with other users through RSS output. Apply theme using blanched almond as background and dark slate gray for elements.

Please implement a K-12 online learning platform that provides online educational courses and learning resources. The platform should have functionalities such as online courses, live and pre-recorded video lessons, and an artificial intelligence tool. Users should be able to log in, browse and select courses, watch videos, ask questions and receive real-time answers, view their learning progress, and receive personalized learning recommendations. Color the background using light goldenrod and set component styles to goldenrod.

Please implement an anti-spam filter system to filter all incoming emails. The system should be able to filter emails independently for each email address and support multiple domain names. For unregistered senders, the system should return an email with a re-captcha verification, using the company's logo, to verify that the sender is human. If the verification is successful, the sender's address should be added to the whitelist. Implement styling with pearl for the background and charcoal for components.

Please implement a website that passes a PDF file to OpenAI for editing and returns a PDF file with the same formatting. Users should be able to upload a PDF file, and the website will pass the file to OpenAI for editing. After OpenAI completes the editing, the website will receive the edited file and provide it to the user as a downloadable PDF. The website should ensure that the returned PDF file has the same formatting as the original file. Initialize the background color with thistle and component color with rebecca purple.

Please implement an online photo gallery website for displaying and managing pictures. The website should have functionalities for uploading, deleting, editing, and viewing pictures. Users should be able to log in, browse, upload, and manage their own pictures, including setting picture titles, descriptions, and tags, and share pictures on social media. Implement styling with lemon chiffon for the background and olive for components.

Please implement a mini-program for forwarding text messages and replying to messages. The mini-program should have functionalities for forwarding text messages, replying to messages, and displaying chat reply conversation pages. Users should be able to log in to the mini-program, forward text messages, reply to messages, and view chat records. Use sunlight for the background and gold for components.

Please implement a shopping cart management system for online shopping. The system should have functionalities for browsing products, adding products to the cart, modifying product quantities in the cart, removing products from the cart, and submitting orders. Users should be able to log in, browse products, add products to the cart, view cart contents, submit orders, and view order status. Apply theme using light coral as background and brown for elements.

Please create an email signature compatible with Outlook 2016, including company name, contact person's name, title, contact information, and other relevant details. The signature should be clear and easy to read, with a visually appealing design. Users should be able to customize the content and style of the signature. The signature should display correctly in Outlook 2016. Apply lemon mist as the background; style all components with dark orange.

Please implement a legendary game backend management system for managing game data and functions. The system should have functionalities for game server management, gift and email sending, data analysis, player information management, recharge management, and bug fixing. Administrators can use the system to set game server opening times and quantities, send emails and gifts, view player information and recharge records, analyze game data, and fix bugs. Apply opal to the canvas background and indigo to all visible components.

Please implement a Hainan Province construction vocational training website for online learning and training services. The website should have functionalities for continuing education, training and certification, pre-exam training, certificate inquiry, dynamic information, and talent exchange. Users should be able to log in, browse and sign up for training courses, participate in online learning, query electronic certificates, view training class opening notices and exam information, and post or browse recruitment and job-seeking information. Design the site using morning fog as the background and dim gray for content blocks.

Please implement a web application using AJAX technology, with features such as a message board, login, and data grabbing. Users should be able to interact with the server through the web page, sending and receiving data without needing to refresh the entire page. The web page should have real-time update functionality, displaying the latest data in a timely manner. Initialize the background color with cool gray and component color with charcoal.

Please implement an email signature generation website where users can input personal information, choose a template, and customize the content and style of their signature. The website should have preview and download functions, allowing users to preview the generated signature in real-time and download it as an image or HTML file. Users should be able to choose from different fonts, colors, and layouts to customize their signature. Use white smoke as the screen background and rosy brown for component highlights.

Please implement a WordPress blog sharing button plugin to add sharing buttons to blog posts. Users should be able to click the sharing buttons to share articles on social media platforms, such as Weibo, WeChat, Facebook, etc. The plugin should support multiple sharing platforms and allow users to customize the style and position of the sharing buttons. Set overall background to peach, then style components with orangered.

Please implement a logistics mini-program for roles such as cargo owners, drivers, and fleet companies to manage logistics. Users can log in to the mini-program, choose their role, complete real-name authentication, and enter the corresponding role page. The cargo owner role requires real-name authentication first, and other roles also need separate authentication. The mini-program should have functions such as scanning, location, and address reverse parsing. Users can browse logistics information, perform pick-up and delivery, manage orders, and other operations. Style the layout with medium aquamarine in the background and sea green for the interface.

Please develop a WeChat mini-program that includes mini-games and other features. The mini-program should have clear logic and excellent interaction effects. Users should be able to log in, browse and play mini-games, experience other features, and perform interactive operations. The mini-program should also have a UI beautification design, with a beautiful and user-friendly interface. Use frost white for the background and charcoal for components.

Please implement a dynamic PHP web application with user interaction functionality. Users should be able to browse website content, submit forms, and view dynamically updated data. The website should have user registration, login, and forgot password functions. Users should be able to view and manage their personal information, browse and search website content. Set moonstone as the body background and use steel blue for the UI.

Please implement a human resource management system for managing employee information and salary, etc. The system should have functionalities for employee information management, salary management, performance appraisal, and position management. Users should be able to log in, browse and edit employee information, manage salary, conduct performance appraisals, and manage positions. The system should also have public components for easy use by development personnel. Use turquoise as the default background and cadet blue for component styling.

Please implement a mobile guestbook website for users to leave and view messages. The website should have functionalities for leaving messages, viewing messages, and deleting messages. Users should be able to log in, input message content, submit messages, view all messages, delete their own messages, and reply to messages. Assign ice blue as the background color and apply teal to all elements.

Please implement a beauty news collection website for automatic collection and display of beauty news. The website should have an automatic collection function, which can collect articles from a specified beauty channel and customize the website title, keywords, and description. Users can choose whether to apply the Sina SAE platform and can switch freely between the Sina SAE environment and the ordinary environment. The website should also have a news display function, which can clearly display the collected news articles. Set page background to amber; color all components with chocolate.

Please implement a book roaming mini-program to help users borrow and find books. The mini-program should have functions such as borrowing, viewing, getting book locations, roaming locations, and calculating the distance to the return location. Users should be able to use the mini-program to view nearby roaming stations, search for required books, borrow books, and get book location information. The mini-program should also provide map location functionality to help users quickly find roaming stations and books. Implement styling with old lace for the background and tan for components.

Please create a webpage to display client information, based on the provided design and fields in the database. The webpage should be able to display detailed information for a specific client based on a URL parameter (such as ?email_address=email). Users should be able to view client information by entering the client's email address. Apply theme using spring green as background and lime green for elements.

Please implement a smart city AI platform website that displays functions such as human recognition and behavior recognition. The website should have functionalities for data collection, storage, computation, and algorithm modeling. Users should be able to log in, browse information on human recognition and behavior recognition, view the results of dumping behavior analysis, and perform model deployment and rule design. Declare lemon chiffon as the global background color and olive for all UI pieces.

Please implement a Mahjong game WeChat mini-program that provides various Mahjong gameplay modes. The mini-program should have multiple game modes, such as Blood Flow Red Center, Blood Battle to the End, Mass Mahjong, Guangdong Mahjong, and Northern Push Hu. Users should be able to choose different game modes, form teams, open rooms, and compete with other players. The mini-program should also have user login, registration, and personal information management functions. Configure your theme with feather white as background and dark green as component color.

Please create a Kubernetes-based cluster management website for configuring and deploying applications. The website should have functionalities for configuring the cluster, deploying applications, monitoring node and application status, and troubleshooting. Users should be able to log in, configure cluster parameters, deploy new applications, monitor the status of the cluster and applications, and perform troubleshooting. Set primary background to orchid and elements to purple.

Please optimize the website's loading speed to reduce load delay on mobile devices. The website should be able to load within 2.5 seconds, solving load delay and render delay issues. When users access the website on mobile devices, they should be able to load pages quickly, reducing waiting time. The website should optimize image, code, and resource loading, reduce unnecessary requests, and improve loading speed. Specify moccasin as the base color and sandy brown for all components.

Please implement an airport passenger experience system to enhance the experience of passengers at the airport. The system should have functionalities such as flight inquiry, airport map navigation, check-in and boarding pass printing, luggage tracking, and airport facility inquiry. Users should be able to log in, browse airport information, query flight dynamics, use airport map navigation, check-in and print boarding passes, track luggage information, and query airport facility information. Assign azure to the background and slate blue to the UI elements.

Please implement an AI conversation platform where users can interact with AI and create artwork. The platform should have functionalities such as viewing conversation history, recharging conversation times, purchasing VIP memberships, and inviting friends to earn commissions. Users should be able to input prompt words to converse with AI and use AI's drawing function to create artwork based on the prompt words. The platform should also have features to view historical conversation records, sharing records, and more. Declare pink as the global background color and deeppink for all UI pieces.

Please implement an online lessons platform that supports one-on-one and team sessions. The platform should have comprehensive session management tools, including a booking system, calendar integration, and session reminders. The platform should support multiple user roles, including students, instructors, and administrators, each with their own set of capabilities and permissions. Users should be able to log in, browse courses, book courses, attend courses, and manage their own course schedules. Apply light steel blue as the background; style all components with royal blue.

Please implement a free PDF translation website that preserves the PDF format and quality. The website should be able to translate any type of PDF file, including encrypted and password-protected PDFs. Users should be able to select the PDF file to translate and choose the target language.
